WorkItem.Description:
Hi
in version 2.2.14 the mage hit calcs are not taking the above buffs into account even though i have them checked. confimed bug on another PC/player
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Hit not taking misery or heroic presence into account

Comments.Message: They definitely are taken into account. What evidence do you have that they are not?

I have 280 odd hit on my gear with no hit gems. If I optomise, while having misery and heroic presence ticked, the optomiser suggests 3 x  hit gems taking me well over the actual hitcap in my spec which is 184 with those buffs present.  My sister in law has the same issue. she is well over the hitcap in a fire spec without using any gems, but the optomiser suggests 4 x hit gems to get her hitcapped.

You can have a look at my armoury - http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Chamber+of+Aspects&n=Nimba
in an arcanee spec, i should not need any further hit from gems yet the optomiser suggests 40 extra hit from gems in my case.
You're going to have to post your character file for us to point out the problem.
Sure thing ast. here you go...

I can't reproduce this. When I load this character (which is loaded with FB spec) and run optimize it does not put any hit gems in. Also on stats tab it shows hit as 17.23% which is above cap. But for me the character shows 347 hit rating from gear, not 280 as you said. Also the hit cap for fire spec is 341 with heroic presence and misery. 184 is hit cap for arcane spec. Maybe the problem is that you had the wrong spec selected in your character than what you wanted?

HI
Ive probably given you the wrong (very old) file. Ill grab the new one when I get home.

Hi Guys

Ive been looking at this and I cannot repuce my issue either anymore. I think I probably did get the talents mixed up (arcane/fire instead of full arcane). Maximum appologies and tahnks for the help. Ill pop a donation into your pot! :)
